lead_paragraph: Swiss voters would rather maintain close economic ties with the European Union than adopt immigration curbs that could jeopardize Switzerland's access to the EU single market, a survey published on Sunday showed.
snippet: Swiss voters would rather maintain close economic ties with the European Union than adopt immigration curbs that could jeopardize Switzerland's access to the EU single market, a survey published on Sunday showed....

headline.main: Swiss Favor Close EU Ties Over Immigration Curbs: Survey
headline.print_headline: Swiss Favor Close EU Ties Over Immigration Curbs: Survey
